column1: #Text=Aang says : " Katara , remember how Unagi almost got me yesterday ? "
#Text=Aang says : " Well , I 'm gon na go ride it now .
#Text=" Aang says : " You 're not going to stop me ?
#Text=" Aang says : " I know it 's great .
#Text=" Katara says : " I 'm glad you know .
#Text=" Aang says : " I 'm glad you 're glad .
#Text=" Suki says : " You 're not going to master it in one day .
#Text=" Sokka says : " I think I 'm starting to get it .
#Text=" Suki says : " It 's not about strength .
#Text=Our technique is about using your opponents ' force against them .
#Text=Think of the fan as an extension of your arm .
#Text=Wait for an opening and then ... " Sokka says : " Hmm ... " Suki says : " I fell on purpose to make you feel better !
#Text=" Suki says : " Okay , it was a lucky shot .
#Text=Let 's see if you can do it again .
